name: CR Helicopters
about: C-R Helicopters, located at the Nashua Airport in Nashua, New Hampshire, is a premier helicopter flight training institution in New England. Our facility features spacious classrooms and a heated hangar, all under one roof, ensuring easy and quick access to our aircraft for hands-on learning and comfort. We offer a comprehensive range of training programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Certificate. As a trusted authority in helicopter flight training, C-R Helicopters has trained many of the region's professional pilots. Our commitment to excellence and safety makes us the go-to choice for aspiring helicopter pilots. With a focus on both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, we provide a well-rounded education to prepare students for successful careers in aviation.
